Indian.name: Masala Dosa
Indian.description: Crispy South Indian rice–lentil crepes stuffed with spiced potato masala, served with sambar and coconut chutney.
procedure: Soak rice, urad dal, and fenugreek for 6 hours. — Continue as per your taste preference or adjust seasoning to suit.
Grind and ferment overnight. — Continue as per your taste preference or adjust seasoning to suit.
Prepare potato masala with onions, curry leaves, turmeric, and boiled potatoes. — Boil until ingredients are tender but not mushy. Drain any excess water.
Spread dosa batter on hot tawa, add masala, fold, and serve with chutney/sambar. — Stir well so all ingredients combine evenly and absorb flavors.

Indian.name: Palak Paneer
Indian.description: Paneer cubes cooked in smooth spinach gravy flavored with garlic and spices.
procedure: Blanch spinach, blend to puree. — Continue as per your taste preference or adjust seasoning to suit.
Sauté onions, garlic, and ginger. — Sauté until the onions turn golden and the raw aroma disappears.
Add spices and spinach puree, simmer. — Stir well so all ingredients combine evenly and absorb flavors.
Add paneer cubes and finish with cream. — Stir well so all ingredients combine evenly and absorb flavors.

Indian.name: Chole (Chana Masala)
Indian.description: Punjabi-style chickpeas cooked in a spicy onion–tomato gravy.
procedure: Soak chickpeas overnight, pressure cook. — Continue as per your taste preference or adjust seasoning to suit.
Cook onions, ginger-garlic, and tomatoes with spices. — Continue as per your taste preference or adjust seasoning to suit.
Add chickpeas, simmer until thick. — Stir well so all ingredients combine evenly and absorb flavors.
Garnish with coriander and serve. — Serve hot with your choice of sides or condiments for the best experience.

Indian.name: Vegetable Biryani
Indian.description: Fragrant basmati rice cooked with spiced mixed vegetables and saffron.
procedure: Parboil rice with whole spices. — Boil until ingredients are tender but not mushy. Drain any excess water.
Cook vegetables with biryani masala. — Continue as per your taste preference or adjust seasoning to suit.
Layer rice and vegetables, add saffron milk. — Stir well so all ingredients combine evenly and absorb flavors.
Dum cook for 20 minutes. — Continue as per your taste preference or adjust seasoning to suit.

Indian.name: Baingan Bharta
Indian.description: Smoky roasted eggplant mashed and cooked with onions, tomatoes, and spices.
procedure: Roast brinjal on flame, peel and mash. — Continue as per your taste preference or adjust seasoning to suit.
Sauté onions, ginger, garlic, and tomatoes. — Sauté until the onions turn golden and the raw aroma disappears.
Add mashed brinjal, spices, and cook. — Stir well so all ingredients combine evenly and absorb flavors.
Garnish with coriander. — Continue as per your taste preference or adjust seasoning to suit.

Indian.name: Pav Bhaji
Indian.description: Spicy mashed vegetable curry served with butter-toasted bread.
procedure: Boil potatoes, peas, cauliflower. — Boil until ingredients are tender but not mushy. Drain any excess water.
Cook onion, capsicum, and tomato with pav bhaji masala. — Continue as per your taste preference or adjust seasoning to suit.
Mash in vegetables, simmer with butter. — Continue as per your taste preference or adjust seasoning to suit.
Serve with toasted pav. — Serve hot with your choice of sides or condiments for the best experience.

Indian.name: Idli with Sambar
Indian.description: Steamed rice–lentil cakes with a tangy vegetable-lentil stew.
procedure: Ferment rice–dal batter overnight. — Continue as per your taste preference or adjust seasoning to suit.
Steam batter in idli plates. — Continue as per your taste preference or adjust seasoning to suit.
Prepare sambar with toor dal, tamarind, and vegetables. — Continue as per your taste preference or adjust seasoning to suit.
Serve hot with chutney. — Serve hot with your choice of sides or condiments for the best experience.

Indian.name: Aloo Paratha
Indian.description: Whole-wheat flatbread stuffed with spiced potato mash, cooked on a tawa.
procedure: Prepare dough with wheat flour. — Continue as per your taste preference or adjust seasoning to suit.
Boil and mash potatoes, add spices. — Boil until ingredients are tender but not mushy. Drain any excess water.
Stuff into dough balls, roll, and cook on tawa with ghee. — Continue as per your taste preference or adjust seasoning to suit.
Serve with curd or pickle. — Serve hot with your choice of sides or condiments for the best experience.

Indian.name: Vegetable Pulao
Indian.description: Quick one-pot rice dish cooked with mixed vegetables and mild spices.
procedure: Heat oil, sauté spices, onions, and ginger-garlic. — Sauté until the onions turn golden and the raw aroma disappears.
Add vegetables and soaked rice. — Stir well so all ingredients combine evenly and absorb flavors.
Cook with water until rice is done. — Continue as per your taste preference or adjust seasoning to suit.
Fluff and serve with raita. — Serve hot with your choice of sides or condiments for the best experience.

Indian.name: Gulab Jamun
Indian.description: Deep-fried milk-solid dumplings soaked in cardamom–rose sugar syrup.
procedure: Prepare dough with khoya and flour. — Continue as per your taste preference or adjust seasoning to suit.
Shape into balls, fry until golden. — Fry on medium flame until golden brown, stirring occasionally for even cooking.
Soak in warm sugar syrup with cardamom and rose water. — Continue as per your taste preference or adjust seasoning to suit.
Serve warm. — Serve hot with your choice of sides or condiments for the best experience.

Chinese.name: Vegetable Fried Rice
Chinese.description: Stir-fried rice with soy sauce, vegetables, and spring onions.
procedure: Cook rice and cool. — Continue as per your taste preference or adjust seasoning to suit.
Heat oil, add garlic and vegetables. — Stir well so all ingredients combine evenly and absorb flavors.
Add soy sauce, salt, and pepper. — Stir well so all ingredients combine evenly and absorb flavors.
Mix in rice, stir-fry on high flame. — Fry on medium flame until golden brown, stirring occasionally for even cooking.

Chinese.name: Veg Manchurian
Chinese.description: Deep-fried vegetable balls simmered in a tangy soy-garlic sauce.
procedure: Make balls from grated cabbage, carrot, and flour. — Continue as per your taste preference or adjust seasoning to suit.
Deep fry until golden. — Fry on medium flame until golden brown, stirring occasionally for even cooking.
Prepare sauce with garlic, soy, chili sauce. — Continue as per your taste preference or adjust seasoning to suit.
Simmer balls in sauce and serve. — Serve hot with your choice of sides or condiments for the best experience.

Chinese.name: Hakka Noodles

Add soy, vinegar, chili sauce. — Stir well so all ingredients combine evenly and absorb flavors.
Toss in noodles and stir-fry. — Fry on medium flame until golden brown, stirring occasionally for even cooking.

Chinese.name: Mapo Tofu (Veg)

procedure: Cube tofu, blanch lightly. — Continue as per your taste preference or adjust seasoning to suit.

Simmer tofu in sauce. — Continue as per your taste preference or adjust seasoning to suit.
Garnish with scallions. — Continue as per your taste preference or adjust seasoning to suit.

Chinese.name: Spring Rolls
Chinese.description: Crispy fried rolls stuffed with spiced vegetables.
procedure: Prepare filling with cabbage, carrot, noodles, and sauces. — Continue as per your taste preference or adjust seasoning to suit.
Fill spring roll sheets and roll tightly. — Continue as per your taste preference or adjust seasoning to suit.
Deep fry until golden. — Fry on medium flame until golden brown, stirring occasionally for even cooking.
Serve with sweet chili sauce. — Serve hot with your choice of sides or condiments for the best experience.

Chinese.name: Hot and Sour Soup
Chinese.description: Spicy, tangy soup with vegetables, soy, and vinegar.
procedure: Boil vegetable stock. — Boil until ingredients are tender but not mushy. Drain any excess water.
Add mushrooms, cabbage, carrots. — Stir well so all ingredients combine evenly and absorb flavors.
Season with soy, vinegar, chili paste. — Continue as per your taste preference or adjust seasoning to suit.

Chinese.name: Kung Pao Vegetables

Add soy, vinegar, chili paste. — Stir well so all ingredients combine evenly and absorb flavors.

Chinese.name: Chili Garlic Noodles

Stir-fry garlic, soy, and cornstarch slurry. — Fry on medium flame until golden brown, stirring occasionally for even cooking.
Add broccoli and coat well. — Stir well so all ingredients combine evenly and absorb flavors.

Chinese.name: Steamed Veg Dumplings

procedure: Prepare dough and veg filling. — Continue as per your taste preference or adjust seasoning to suit.
Stuff and fold dumplings. — Continue as per your taste preference or adjust seasoning to suit.
Steam for 10–12 mins. — Continue as per your taste preference or adjust seasoning to suit.
Serve with dipping sauce. — Serve hot with your choice of sides or condiments for the best experience.

Roll and place in baking dish. — Continue as per your taste preference or adjust seasoning to suit.
Top with enchilada sauce and cheese. — Continue as per your taste preference or adjust seasoning to suit.
Bake until golden. — Bake in a preheated oven at 180°C (350°F) until golden and crisp.
